faqs.q: How do I limit a payment link to a single payment?
faqs.a: Dashboard: Create or edit the link → enable “Limit the number of payments” and set 1. API: pass restrictions[completed_sessions][limit]=1 when creating or updating.

faqs.q: How do I set a custom message for a deactivated link?
faqs.a: Dashboard: when limiting payments choose “Change deactivation message”. API: pass inactive_message on create or update.

faqs.q: How do I collect billing and shipping addresses?
faqs.a: Dashboard: Options → Collect customers’ addresses (billing only or billing + shipping). For shipping choose allowed countries and optional shipping rates. API: billing_address_collection and shipping_address_collection with allowed_countries.

faqs.q: How do I collect phone numbers?
faqs.a: Dashboard: enable “Require customers to provide a phone number”. API: use phone_number_collection when creating the link.

faqs.q: How do I enable automatic tax?
faqs.a: Dashboard: toggle “Collect tax automatically”. API: automatic_tax[enabled]=true.

faqs.q: Can I require terms of service acceptance?
faqs.a: Yes. Set Terms and Privacy URLs in Public details, then require acceptance on the payment link.

faqs.q: Can I add custom fields in checkout?
faqs.a: Yes. Types: Text, Numbers only, Dropdown. Do not collect sensitive data. Up to 10 options via Dashboard, up to 200 via API for Dropdown.

faqs.q: How do I pre-fill email or add a promo code?
faqs.a: Use URL parameters: prefilled_email, prefilled_promo_code, and locale.

faqs.q: Can I use my own domain for links?
faqs.a: Yes. Add a custom domain so links use your subdomain, e.g. pay.example.com.

faqs.q: How do I save payment details for future use?
faqs.a: Enable “Save payment details for future use” in Advanced options when creating a link. Follow legal guidance.
